Title: Full Disclosure
Writer: Aaron Korsh (created by), Ethan Drogin, Sharyn Rothstein (executive story editor), Sandra Silverstein (executive story editor)
Actors: Gabriel Macht, Patrick J. Adams, Rick Hoffman, Meghan Markle
Plot: Harvey learns the scope of Alex's involvement in the prison case, while Mike races to keep it alive. Lipschitz forces Louis out of his comfort zone. Donna struggles with her work/life balance.
